author: CBS News
title: Man intentionally derails train near Navy ship aiding virus crisis
description: Eduardo Moreno "stated that he thought that the USNS Mercy was suspicious and did not believe 'the ship is what they say it's for,'" the complaint said.
content: A train engineer intentionally drove a speeding locomotive off a track at the Port of Los Angeles because he was suspicious about the presence of a Navy hospital ship docked there to help during the coronovirus crisis, federal prosecutors said Wednesday. The … [+3381 chars]
